data.name: Gaia Organism Demand
data.detailed_description:
Track List


About the Game


"Gaia Organism Demand" is a music album with the theme of "Ocean and Environmental Protection", and it is also the OST of Touhou Koi-Mystery.
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1609270

It has 12 high-quality Oriental musics, including 8 original musics and 4 Touhou project arrange musics.

A large number of tracks used or unused in the game.

The 12 chapter story set tells the story of the protagonist Komeiji Koishi with a marine creature to pursue the "Curse of Oxygen".


Under the sky, the spirits on the earth should breathe together
——The creatures greedily use the corpses of the dead, and the curse of oxygen will be doubled.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Storage (high-quality audio): Additional 2 GB available space
